publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3208 Lewis Macdonald: The Draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2005â€”That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Care and Treatment) (Scotland) Act 2003 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2005 be approved.Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*
